wikipedia_page.main: Betty Fields , born in Rochdale, Lancashire, was a British actress. She was the sister of Gracie Fields. In 1936 she starred in the lead of On Top of the World in a role originally intended for her sister.

link_mentions.page: List of films featuring the French Foreign Legion
response: |A. Bromley Davenport, Betty Fields and Leslie Fuller
| On Top of the World || Redd Davis || Betty Fields, Frank Pettingell || Comedy ||
On Top of the World is a 1936 British comedy film directed by Redd Davis and starring Betty Fields, Frank Pettingell and Leslie Bradley.
